attributes.action: BRING BACK HUNTING, A CRUCIAL PART OF BRITISH LIFE AND CULTURE
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: banning hunting is the first outrageous step that will soon lead to the ban of fishing, farming and all sorts of other rural activities that the people in power will insist upon banning when they know nothing about them and never will!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
